Name: MinigolfPark VR
About the game: Welcome to MinigolfPark VR! In MinigolfPark VR you will experience playing minigolf in virtual reality on a variety of courses. No need for power meters and swing indicators. The motion controls provide a realistic experience and immersion. Currently the game features three courses with 18 holes each. The classic course will provide you with a relaxed and fun experience while the space course will challenge you with different gadgets like ufos, lasers, gravity planets and wormholes. The third course has a pirate themes and you will be challenged by rolling barrels, cannons and bombs. A multiplayer mode to play with your friends is planned to be included in a later update.
Meta Title: MinigolfPark VR: Mar 29, 2019, HappyFields and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on MinigolfPark VR? Check out the release date (Mar 29, 2019), developer insights from HappyFields, and a complete game summary.
